column1: Assistant Professor For Health Information Management
column2: SRMC University is looking for Assistant Professor For Health Information Management to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      As an Assistant Professor in Health Information Management (HIM), you will play a key role in educating and preparing students for careers in managing health information systems and ensuring the security and integrity of healthcare data      This role involves teaching, curriculum development, research, and contributing to the academic and professional development of students        Key Responsibilities:        Teaching and Instruction:Conduct lectures, seminars, and practical sessions on health information management topics      Develop and deliver course content that aligns with program objectives      Curriculum Development:Contribute to the development and enhancement of the HIM curriculum      Integrate industry trends, technology advancements, and regulatory changes into the curriculum      Student Assessment:Develop and administer assessments to evaluate students' understanding and application of HIM concepts      Provide constructive feedback on assignments and exams      Research and Scholarship:Engage in scholarly activities, including research, publications, and presentations      Stay abreast of developments in HIM, healthcare technology, and data management      Advising and Mentorship:Provide academic and career guidance to students      Mentor students in research projects and professional development      Industry Collaboration:Foster relationships with healthcare organizations, IT vendors, and industry professionals      Facilitate internships, guest lectures, or industry partnerships for students      Professional Development:Stay updated on advancements in HIM practices, healthcare regulations, and technology      Attend conferences, workshops, and training programs      Participation in Committees:Contribute to departmental and university committees related to curriculum, accreditation, and academic policies      Community Engagement:Participate in community outreach and educational programs related to health information management      Represent the department at industry events or conferences      Quality Assurance:Ensure the quality and relevance of HIM education through continuous improvement initiatives      Participate in program assessments and accreditation processes
column11: project management, data management, information management, teaching, training, workshop management, knowledge management, research, healthcare, assurance, curriculum development, vendor, lecturer activities, hotel management, communication skills
column15: Sri Ramachandra Institute of Higher Education and Research (SRIHER)
column17: Sri Ramachandra Institute of Higher Education and Research (SRIHER)

Only male candidate is preferred.       EXPERIENCE     2-4/4-6/6-8/above 8 years.       EDUCATION     Diploma, BE/B.Tech, ME/M Tech(Electrical, Electronics, Mechatronics, Mechanical)

column2: Job Description          About Us :          Neufvasi is a Technical and Executive recruiting firm dedicated to Cybersecurity, Information Technology, Telecommunication EdTech From Top companies to startups; our focus is to pair talented professionals with companies who value them.          Roles and Responsibility :          QA ENGINEER          Qualifications            Overall experience of 6+ years              5+ years of white-box testing and automation including testing REST services.              2+ years of Quality Management and People Management Experience              Experience with setting up Test Strategies for large scale applications              Must possess a comprehensive understanding of the Software Development Process, QA best practices and methodologies              Understands object oriented software development using programming languages such as Java.              Experience in influencing change to existing QA process and implementing them              In-depth understanding of the perspectives and needs of the customers.              Thorough understanding of the Software Development Life Cycle with an emphasis on those areas that Quality Assurance is primarily responsible for prototyping and/or researching the up and coming technology and solutions.              Experienced quality engineer who can take ownership of manual testing activities for multi-tier web based and mobile web platform.              In-depth knowledge of software quality assurance concepts, methodologies to aid team in the testing activities.              Efficient in testing using UI and RESTAPI s.              Efficient in working with database and writing SQL queries.              Experience/Understanding automating white box testing for web services or UI a plus.

column2: The E-Business program is a unique course, customized to keep focus on the critical role that Technology plays in all the aspects of human life. Va    rious Technological advances have altered and disrupted the business world as well. E Commerce has changed consumer interface and has multiplied omni channels for products & services .      This Program prepares future-ready digital professionals, who understand the nuts and bolts of E-Commerce. It is imperative that Business Managers are sensitive and prepared to use E-Commerce to their advantage and in turn ,excel in their roles and responsibilities.      The transformative pedagogy includes lectures, on-field industrial projects( industries including Retail, Lifestyle, Consumer Technology & Hospitality) and research experience through industry internships besides providing premium knowledge & skills of general management. In-house Faculty experts and those drawn from the Industry provide the students with high quality relevant content. ( Organizations who are our partners , include Rediffmail.com, Shopify, IBM, DBS Bank, Aditya Birla, Shaadi.com, FlipKart, KPMG, RemitGuru.com, NSEIT Ltd. and Accenture.)      We are looking for a seasoned senior professional, who has a combination of competencies, in the broad space of e-Commerce, Digital Marketing, e-Business, & Digital Transformation , We require applicants to have demonstrated skills in one or more of the following: ability to demonstrate relevant tool kits. : Digital Marketing: including SEO, SEM, Google Analytics, integration of CRM, Web listening, sentiment analysis, social media and content marketing, marketing automation (campaign management tools)      App Development: (including development of Web-based applications , Mobile app development, Low/No-Code development)      Automation: Developing chatbots, Process Automation using RPA, Intelligent automation using contemporary RPA tools      Analytics and AI : Tableau/MS-Power BI, Python, Business Analytics concepts and algorithms, Machine Learning      Artificial Intelligence: Advanced Machine learning, Big Data (Hadoop) Narrow AI applications, Artificial Neural Networks, Developing AI applications, Deep Learning.      Other Future Technologies - AR/VR, IOT      It would be an added advantage if the selected candidate has demonstrated the ability to access the above technologies & tools from subscription based cloud platforms and virtual labs.        Qualification requirements:    PhD and First-Class Master s Degree in related field. 10, 7, 5 years of teaching/industry/research experience for Professor, Associate Professor and Assistant Professor respectively.
column11: Google Analytics, Campaign management, Social media, Business analytics, Machine learning, SEM, SEO, Digital marketing, CRM, Python

column2: We are looking for highly experienced and motivated faculty for postgraduate management programs. Along with teaching, corporate training and consulti          ng, faculty will need to be involved in development of course material across programs and establishing and maintaining of strong linkage with industry.      Candidate must have hands-on work experience in at least a few of these areas: LIMS, HIMS, Healthcare Informatics, Wearable Medical Devices and Monitoring, Robotic Process Automation, Rehabilitation and Assistive Technologies, Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Block chain, Virtual Reality, and Mobile App Startups.      Candidates with relevant experience from pharmaceuticals, medical devices, analytics, consultancy & technology, insurance, health economics & finance, public policy, healthcare services with an innovative mindset preferred.      The applicant must be well acquainted with latest trends in your sector and come with the ability to create and strengthen partnership with stakeholders.        Qualification requirements:        PhD and First-Class Masters Degree in related field. 10, 7, 5 years of teaching/industry/research experience for Professor, Associate Professor and Assistant Professor respectively.

Roles and Responsibility :         Context of the Role:         The resource will support team strategy - works across digital, technology, marketing, and customer experience to develop, plan and         manage innovation projects and interventions         Supports and facilitates ideation, discovery, and proof of concept processes. Identifies trends in the banking and financial services         industry that could impact the organization success         Analyse data, prepared scorecards, dashboards and reports for team to measure volume, adoption, ongoing volume, customer         behaviour and the customer journey across the platform         Key Responsibilities:         Supports implementation of digital and innovation projects.Develop business cases for digital & service improvement initiatives         Works with cross-functional teams to define requirements for digital solutions         Tracks and report on progress, risks, issues, and metrics Interfaces with stakeholders and executives on project requirements, project status and conflict resolution         Analyses data, prepared scorecards, dashboards and reports for team to measure volume, adoption, customer behavior and the customer journey across the platform. column2: Nature of Job:    Remote     Academy of Art University welcomes applicants for a full-time Senior Trainer position. In this role, the Senior Trainer for Online Education will identify, define and implement effective training and resources to support students, faculty, administrators and staff in the use of an online learning environment consisting of Brightspace, Kaltura, LTI markup, and related teaching and learning tools. We are seeking candidates that are passionate about learning, knowledgeable with systems and who can effectively work with others and influence their professional abilities.       Responsibilities   :       Identify training audiences and articulate specific needs and considerations of each audience.     Define authoring and delivery platforms and resources for identified training audiences.     Define outcomes for training audiences, training sequencing and communication strategy.     Write, develop and administer trainings in multiple formats.     Collect feedback and success data and ensure that training is continually improved.         Requirements:         Possess extensive experience in the development and delivery of training materials in written, video and webinar formats.     Familiarity with best practices in online education and onsite education. Prior experience working with online faculty and students is preferred.     Art and design interest and professional experience is a plus.     Familiarity and prior experience with educational technologies, such as learning management systems (LMS).     Excellent writing, communication and presentation skills.     Ability to learn complex systems quickly.     Proficiency with relevant software tools: collaborative text-editing tools such as Google Docs; screen-capture programs such as Camtasia or iShowU; PowerPoint; online authoring environments such as wikis, blogging platforms and WYSIWYG web design tools.

column1: Professor ??Centre For Academic Research and Technology
column2: He may not have a regular load or may not be engaged in other administrative tasks     In case of a faculty working under this centre is also engaged in academics then academic load + API calculations of faculty will be updated/ modified trimester wise, considering their research contributions     Criteria to be a Full-time researcher will be laid down and in accordance with that, a person will qualify to be a full-time researcher           Key Accountability         Support in execution of CART strategies      Operational developing strong linkages with appropriate academic departments and units and adding value to line departments through:      Assist in faculty and student enrollment under CART vertical and retention by enriching the research environment;      providing interdisciplinary research training and mentoring for undergraduate and graduate students; and      regular communication of research center activities and opportunities for faculty and students involvement.      Ensure the budget within the area of responsibilities are well tracked, monitored and utilized      Develop and maintain collaborative relationships with the different stake holders in the organization      developing networks between the research centre and researchers in the field in the public and private sectors, locally, nationally and internationally;      where applicable, developing mutually beneficial linkages with industry in order to develop partnerships and collaborative research;      Research center Professor will be responsible for providing research leadership, which normally includes:      a. developing networks between the research center and researchers in the field in the public and private sectors, locally, nationally and internationally;      b. Engage one training program for MIT-WPU FoET faculty members working in the similar technological field and one for the Industry showcasing the research every year.      c. where applicable, developing mutually beneficial linkages with industry in order to develop partnerships and collaborative research;      d. transferring knowledge to society through outreach (e.g. collaborative research; seminars; workshops; lectures; websites; publications) and, where applicable, through technology transfer (e.g. collaborative research; contract work; and commercialization of intellectual property);      e. Conduct market research studies & implement best practices      Academic Professor- Responsibilities Core      The CART Vertical Professor will be research leader, capable of: o maintaining the confidence and cooperation of research center members; o Publish 3 to 4 research papers in Scopus indexed journals during a typical project      period of two years. o Identify and file at least one idea for Patent within two years. o managing effectively and efficiently the research program and administrative      affairs of the research center; and o creating an environment conducive to intellectual and research growth.      Represent MIT WPU on various professional bodies of repute which is value adding building relationship with the community, government agencies, society at large and with ultimate objective of building MIT WPU brand            Person Specification         Able to provide effective and inspiring leadership by being actively involved in all programs and services, developing a broad and deep knowledge of all programs      The ability to advocate at the highest levels regionally and nationally on behalf of the University and to influence the decision maker.      A strong commitment to MIT WPU and its vision, ambitions, and values      The ability to relate to and communicate effectively with staff at all levels in the Division, engaging them with the University s vision and plans;      A personal commitment to and record in effective and respectful partnership working across all staff groups;      Exceptional personal and public communication and relations      Ph.d with 10+ years of experience in research field      Strong interpersonal and communication skills (written and oral)      Candidates having a Citation more than 100 and funded project of INR 50 Lacs or above will be eligible to apply      Ability to define problems, collect data, establish facts, draw valid conclusions

column2: Destiny IT Services Pvt. Ltd. is looking for Assistant Professor to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey. An Assistant Professor is a full     time academic position in a college or university, responsible for teaching, conducting research, and serving on committees. They play a critical role in contributing to the intellectual life of their institution and in preparing the next generation of professionals and leaders.       Responsibilities:       Teach a range of courses in the department, at both the undergraduate and graduate levels     Conduct original research in the field and publish findings in academic journals and at conferences     Advise students and mentor junior faculty members     Participate in department and university     wide committees, such as curriculum committees and search committees     Pursue external funding opportunities to support research and teaching activities     Engage in professional development activities to stay current in the field and enhance teaching skillsRequirements:     A record of successful teaching and research, with a strong publication record in academic journals     Ability to teach a range of courses in the department, at both the undergraduate and graduate levels     Strong communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to mentor students and junior faculty members     A commitment to continued professional development and growth

column2: Jio Institute is currently seeking applications for a faculty role in Artificial Intelligence & Data Science. We aim to recruit educators and researchers who are deeply committed to both teaching and advancing research in Artificial Intelligence & Data Science. The chosen candidate will be instrumental in enriching our academic programs and spearheading research efforts that synergize with the strategic vision of the Institute. Associate Professor:     Jio Institute invites applications for Artificial Intelligence & Data Science in the following disciplines:     Machine Learning   Deep Learning   Natural Language Processing   Computer Vision   Bigdata Engineering     Faculty are expected to establish a robust research program, guide and mentor students and postdoctoral scholars, secure external funding, conduct research, and publish in leading journals and conference proceedings.     They are expected to develop and teach undergraduate and postgraduate classes and participate in service activities at the Institute and relevant professional societies and organizations.     Qualifications:   A Doctorate in a relevant discipline from reputed Indian or global institution, followed by post doctoral work in a world class university - also significant accomplishments in breakthrough research and innovation.    Peer recognition in terms of top awards and honours, election to top academies including a significant international component will be given weightage.    Passion for transformative teaching and thoughtful mentoring of students / scholars.     Benefits include:    - Competitive Salary and retiral benefits   - Medical Insurance for self and family members

CSAT CENTRE Chennai requires Full- time and Part- time faculty to teach for Civil Services Prelims Examination in the following areas: Basic Numeracy, Quantitative Aptitude, Logical Reasoning, Mental Ability & English ??For Basic Numeracy, Quantitative Aptitude, Logical Reasoning, Mental Ability - Engineers or MSc (maths) from a reputed institution with good academic background preferred ??For English- B.A/ M.A/ MPhill/ PHD in English Literature id preferred. ??For all positions, teaching experience of at least an year with good communication skills is desirable. Please write to csatchennai@time4education.com
column11: Com, Faculty, English, Civil, MA, English literature, Time, MSC, phd, BASIC

column11: Associate Professor

column2: Job Description:       1. Ph.D Degree OR significant professional work which can be recognized as equivalent to a Ph.D degree; with First Class at Bachelors or Masters Degree in the appropriate program of Engineering and Technology      2. Minimum eight years in teaching, research or professional experience, out of which four year experience at the level of Assistant Professor or equivalent grade, excluding period spent on obtaining higher research / academic degree      3. High academically published research work such as peer-reviewed research papers, books, technical reports, and patents filed / obtained      4. Experience of guiding project work, dissertation, research of students or supervising RD projects in industry.

column2: Compensation ? $2,200 per 8-week undergraduate course, and $2,500 per 10-week graduate course    .        Nature of Job ? REMOTE        Southern New Hampshire University is currently seeking faculty to teach in our Human Services program. Our online faculty provide high-quality academic experiences and support students as they work toward their educational goals. Online faculty members work collaboratively in a supportive academic environment, partnering with student advising and the academic team to ensure that each student has support, tools and resources he or she need to be successful.        Essential duties and responsibilities of this position include the following:          Provide a high level of student outreach and connect with students, academic advisors and team leads on a frequent basis to ensure student success      Be engaging, offering and increased and innovative presence in the classroom      Provide substantial student feedback and offer a quick turnaround on grades          Minimum Qualifications:          Master s Degree in Human Services; Social Work; Counseling; Related Field      Online teaching experience required- TA experience accepted      At least three years professional field experience specific to course content      Courses currently recruiting for: Law and Ethics in Human Services and in Human Services Organizational Systems          Preferred Qualifications:          PhD strongly preferred          Compensation:          The standard compensation for most courses is $2,200 per 8-week undergraduate course, and $2,500 per 10-week graduate course.      Undergraduate and graduate adjuncts are paid bi-weekly and are considered W-2 employees of Southern NH University.      A background check is required for employment and may include licensure/certification verification.

column2: The university offers a range of undergraduate, postgraduate, and      doctoral programs in diverse areas of study including Management, Engineering and Technology,      Science, Agriculture, Commerce, Animation, Psychology and Contemplation, Architecture and      Interior Design, Osteopathy, Nursing, Sports Physiology, Ayurveda, Yoga, Sanskrit Indic Studies      and Performing Arts. The course curriculum at Sri Sri University enriches both domain expertise and      life skills, promoting all-round excellence. The Art of Living Programs, an integral part of the      curriculum at Sri Sri University, provide students with practical tools and techniques to handle stress      and enhance creativity effectively. It has sprawling 188 acres of green and serene campus on the      banks of the river Mahanadi, Cuttack, Odisha, India.                  Essential Academic Requirements:       1. 8 years teaching experience with 5 years teaching experience and minimum 1 year of clinical      experience.      2. Academic and Research Excellence (theory practical) to students.      3. Application of IT for data analysis, Word, Excel, PPT.      4. Good communication skill in English.          Academic, Research, Administration.          Salary and Eligibility Criteria: Negotiable and commensurate with experience.          Nature of appointment: Regular

column1: Professor| Associate Professor For the department of Psychology
column2: Join Our Prestigious Academic Team at Brainware University  Position:  Professor / Associate Professor in Psychology Location:  Barasat, Kolkata, India  Job Types:  Full-time, Permanent Are you a distinguished Psychology educator and researcher with a passion for shaping the future of technology? Brainware University invites you to be a part of our illustrious faculty as a Professor/Associate professor of Psychology.  About Brainware University: Nestled in the vibrant city of Kolkata, Brainware University is renowned for its commitment to academic excellence and innovation. Our institution boasts a rich history of nurturing talent and fostering groundbreaking research. Join us in our mission to empower the next generation of tech visionaries.  Position Overview: Brainware University is looking for a highly motivated, dynamic, and active Associate Professor / Professor for the subject of  Applied Psychology , to take the UG/PG classes, along with active participation in departmental academic administrative relative works, publishing research articles, etc. Job Role: Proficient classroom presentation skills. Participation in departmental academic administrative relative works. Publishing research articles Preparing syllabus for students.  Experience and Qualifications: A Ph.D. in Psychology or a closely related field with good academic scores. An exceptional teaching and research track record. A minimum of 10 years of experience in teaching and research for professor position out of which at least 2 years of experience as an Associate Professor level and for Associate professor position Minimum 8 years of experience of teaching and research is required. At least 10 publications in peer-reviewed journals for professor position and at least 8 publications in Peer-reviewed journals for Associate professor position. Proven record of successfully guiding at least one doctoral candidate. Proficiency in relevant programming languages and technologies. Outstanding communication and leadership skills.  What We Offer: Salary will be fixed after considering all the required criteria and as per the University norms. Opportunities for professional growth and advancement. Access to state-of-the-art research facilities. A vibrant and collaborative academic environment. A chance to shape the future of technology education. To apply, please submit your CV, and a cover letter, to  hrd@brainwareuniversity.ac.in  or you may call  033-69010542 / 9007830503 Or visit our career page at  https://careers.brainwareuniversity.ac.in/ Shape the future of technology education with us at Brainware University. Website:  www.brainwareuniversity.ac.in Facebook:  www.facebook.com/brainwareuniversity

column2: Join Our Team at Brainware University Position:  Associate Professor of Computer Science & Engineering Location:  Barasat, Kolkata, India Are you an accomplished Computer Science educator and researcher ready to take the next step in your career? Brainware University is seeking a dynamic individual to join our team as an  Associate Professor / Professor  of Computer Science & Engineering.  About Brainware University: At Brainware University, we are committed to nurturing innovation, knowledge, and academic excellence. Located in the heart of Kolkata, our institution is known for its world-class faculty and cutting-edge research initiatives. Join us in our mission to empower the leaders of tomorrow.  Position Overview: As an Associate Professor of Computer Science & Engineering, you will play a pivotal role in shaping the academic direction of our institution. You will work alongside a dedicated team of educators and researchers to deliver exceptional education and drive forward innovative research in the field.  Key Responsibilities: Lead and mentor students in their academic and research pursuits. Contribute to curriculum development and program enhancement. Engage in active research, publish in reputable journals, and present at conferences. Collaborate with colleagues on interdisciplinary research projects. Stay current with industry trends and integrate them into the curriculum. Assist in administrative and leadership tasks as required.  Requirements and Qualifications: A Ph.D. in Computer Science & Engineering or a closely related field with a good academic background. Proven teaching excellence and a strong research portfolio. Minimum 8 years of teaching and research experience in Computer Science. Proficiency in relevant programming languages and technologies. At least 7 publications in peer-reviewed journals. Exceptional communication and interpersonal skills. A passion for advancing computer science education.  What We Offer: Competitive starting salary of 10 LPA plus yearly performance incentives. Attractive benefits package. Opportunities for professional development and advancement. Access to state-of-the-art research facilities. A collaborative and supportive academic environment. Join us in shaping the future of Computer Science education and research. Brainware University is the place where you can make a significant impact on the next generation of tech leaders. To apply, please submit your CV and a cover letter to  soumyajyoti.hr @brainwareuniversity.ac.in . or you may call  033-69010651 Or visit our career page at   https://careers.brainwareuniversity.ac.in/ Unlock your potential and elevate your career at Brainware University. Website:  www.brainwareuniversity.ac.in

Conduct scholarly research and publish findings in reputable academic journals, conferences, and other scholarly outlets.   Participate in departmental meetings, committees, and other service activities to support the goals of the department and the university.   Stay current with developments in the field of business administration and incorporate relevant advancements into teaching and research activities.   Collaborate with colleagues within the department and across disciplines to enhance interdisciplinary initiatives and research projects.   Engage with industry partners, alumni, and other stakeholders to promote networking opportunities, experiential learning, and community engagement.   Contribute to the accreditation process and other institutional initiatives as needed.  Desired Candidate Profile A Ph.D. degree in business administration, management, finance, marketing, , or a related field from an accredited institution.   Evidence of excellence in teaching at the undergraduate or graduate level, with a demonstrated ability to engage and inspire students.   Strong research potential or record of scholarly publications in peer-reviewed journals and conferences.   Experience or expertise in one or more specialized areas of business administration (e.g., finance, marketing, operations, strategy).   Effective communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work collaboratively in a diverse academic environment.   Commitment to fostering an inclusive and supportive learning environment that promotes diversity, equity, and inclusion.   Experience with curriculum development, assessment, and accreditation processes is desirable.
column11: Pedagogy, Academics, Mentoring, Educational Administration, Teaching, Team Training, Education, Curriculum Development

column2: As Professor / Associate Professor, Department of Computer Science Engineering the responsibilities include preparing stimulating lessons, identifying and analyzing student needs, strengths, and weaknesses, overseeing experiments, as well as setting and grading assessments. Ensuring faculty development and overall management.              DUTIES & RESPONSIBILITIES        Be responsible and accountable for setting and advancing the academic strategy of the Department in line with Faculty and University strategic plans and direction.          Be an active member of the Faculty Executive Board and contribute to the overall leadership and management of the Faculty: it is expected that Heads of Department will carry functional responsibility for specific agreed cross-cutting Faculty areas.          Develop and sustain appropriate structures for management, consultation, decision-making and communication with staff and students.          Promote and represent the University both internally and externally          Refresh and develop new programmes in order to attract new students and markets.          Conduct research in a particular field of knowledge and publish findings in professional journals, books.          Keep abreast of developments in the field by reading current literature, discussing with colleagues, and participating in professional conferences.          Supervise undergraduate or graduate teaching, internship, and research work.          Collaborate with colleagues to address teaching and research related issues in the Department.          Provide industrial exposure to the students at all stages through their registration, internship, recruitment and placement activities.          Compile bibliographies of specialized materials for outside reading assignments.          Serve on academic or administrative committees that deal with institutional policies.        SKILLS & ABILITIES        Excellent written and verbal communication skills.          Combine several pieces of information and draw conclusions.          Identify what must be changed to reach goals.          Excellent interpersonal skills          Presentation and Organization Skills          Initiative and Confidence          Basic IT skills

column2: Our Education department is looking for a talented and experienced candidate to join us as an Associate Professor.      As an Associate Professor, you will be responsible for lecturing students as per the university syllabus. You will also be conducting research and attending conferences. Additionally, you will have to supervise students as and when needed.      Prior work experience as an Associate Professor or a similar job role will be an added advantage for the candidate. Moreover, you should have excellent communication skills and the ability to manage students efficiently. You should also possess outstanding time management skills and good organizational skills.      If you can fulfill the job responsibilities of an Associate Professor, then do write to us. We would love to have a word with you.      Responsibilities      1. Teach residents and students during their rotation to their patient care units          2. Organizing teaching/training of PG students / other staff, of the department          They will be responsible for all the medical staff working in their respective department/units.Preparing lessons as per the university curriculum.          Researching on new topics in the syllabus.          Developing teaching content as per the requirements.          Explaining and teaching student's various concepts and theories as per your expertise.          Attending departmental and faculty meetings.          Lecturing students related to areas of expertise.          Selecting students for the graduation program.          Organizing seminars and events for the students.          Visiting other colleges and universities as an external resource person.          Suggesting improvements in the teaching methods and techniques.          Paying extra attention to the struggling students.          Offering academic support to the Assistant Professor as well as Professor.          Overseeing and accessing students' project work.          Maintaining a fun environment and engaging students.          Staying abreast of the latest finding in the area of your expertise.          Adhering to rules and regulations of the school board/ university.      Requirements      Master s degree in the required    MD/(Anatomy)              A    s Assistant Professor / Lecturer(Anatomy) in for five years in a recognized Medical college.4+ years of work experience in the            Minimum of two Research publications indexed in Index Medicus/national journals.            An excellent academic record is a must.          Ability to manage a classroom excellently.          Phenomenal communication skills both verbal and written.          Ability to complete the curriculum on time.          Ability to handle stressful situations.          Ability to research and teach efficiently.          Strong work ethics.          A pleasant and hardworking individual.          Outstanding presentation skills.          Good time management and organizational skills.          Good active listening abilities          Ability to work collaboratively.          Ability to work under minimal supervision.
column11: Training, Associate Professor, Time management, Resource Person, Patient care, Assistant Professor, Management, Research, Supervision, Teaching

column2: Teaching: Associate Professors are responsible for teaching undergraduate and/or graduate courses in their area of expertise. This includes preparing and delivering lectures, creating course materials, grading assignments, and advising students.     Research: Conducting original research is a key responsibility. Associate Professors are expected to publish their research findings in reputable academic journals, present at conferences, and contribute to the body of knowledge in their field.Mentoring: Mentoring graduate students, junior faculty, and research assistants.      This involves guiding them in their research, providing career advice, and assisting in their professional development.Service: Serving on departmental, college, and university committees.      This might involve participating in the development of academic policies, curriculum planning, and other administrative tasks.Community Engagement: Engaging with the broader community through outreach programs, public lectures, and collaborations with external organizations.Professional Development: Continuing education and staying current with developments in their field. This could involve attending workshops, conferences, and seminars.Administrative Duties: In some cases, Associate Professors may take on administrative roles within their department or college, such as program director or department chair.     Qualifications:Education: A Ph.D. or terminal degree in the relevant field is typically required.Teaching Experience: Several years of teaching experience at the college or university level, often as an Assistant Professor or in a similar role.     Research Record: A strong record of research and publications in reputable academic journals. This includes demonstrating expertise in a specialized area of the field.Professional Recognition: Recognition within the academic community, which could include awards, honors, and invitations to speak at conferences.Mentoring Skills: Ability to mentor and advise students and junior faculty members effectively.     Collaborative Skills: Ability to work well with colleagues and contribute meaningfully to the academic community.Communication Skills: Excellent oral and written communication skills, both for teaching and for presenting research findings.Leadership Abilities: Demonstrated leadership abilities in research, teaching, or service activities.
column11: Associate Professor

column2: Cadre Associate Professor Prescribed Qualifications and Experience Qualification as above that is for the post of Assistant Professor, as applicable and PhD or equivalent, in appropriate discipline Post PhD publications and guiding PhD student is highly desirable        Minimum of 5 years experience in teaching / research / industry of which 2 years post PhD experience is desirable      In case of Architecture, Professional Practice of 5 years as certified by the Council of Architecture shall also be considered valid      Equivalence for PhD is based on publication of 5 International Journal papers, each Journal having a cumulative impact index of not less than 2.0, with incumbent as the main author and all 5 publications being in the authors area of specialization      PhD shall be from a recognized University      For an incumbent Assistant Professor, experience at the level of Assistant Professor will be considered equivalent to experience at the level of Associate Professor, provided the incumbent Assistant Professor has acquired or acquires PhD Degree in the relevant discipline      Experience at Diploma Institutions is also considered equivalent to experience in degree level Institutions at appropriate level and as applicable      However, qualifications as above shall be mandatory
column11: Publishing, Architecture, Associate Professor, Author, Assistant Professor, Research, Teaching

column2: PGDM-Rural Management (Emerging Economies) program has stemmed from the need of the corporate sector for Managers/future leaders who have a deep under    standing and premium knowledge about the rural sector of India in terms of the needs and aspirations, lifestyle, culture and beliefs of the people residing in the smaller towns and villages. A person, who is empathetic, has leadership qualities and has an innovative mindset so that s/he is able to think out of the box to correctly identify with the problems and then find ingenious solutions to the problems faced by the rural sector      The program seeks to groom students who, not only protect the rights of the persons living in the rural areas, but also empower them by creating access to advancements in technology, markets and other opportunities that the urban population has. They do this while assuming a role either as a Corporate Executive, NGO representative or an entrepreneur.      The program seeks to groom students who, not only protect the rights of the persons living in the rural areas, but also empower them by creating access to advancements in technology, markets and other opportunities that the urban population has. They do this while assuming a role either as a Corporate Executive, NGO representative or an entrepreneur.      The program seeks to groom students who, not only protect the rights of the persons living in the rural areas, but also empower them by creating access to advancements in technology, markets and other opportunities that the urban population has. They do this while assuming a role either as a Corporate Executive, NGO representative or an entrepreneur.        Qualification requirements:    PhD and First-Class Master s Degree in related field. 10, 7, 5 years of teaching/industry/research experience for Professor, Associate Professor and Assistant Professor respectively.
column11: Corporate Executive, Industry research, Associate Professor, Corporate, Manager Technology, Assistant Professor, Representative, Management, Entrepreneur, Teaching

column2: Retailing is ever changing, and the constantly evolving business environment demands professionals with an ability to adapt and imbibe relevant skill    sets, as well as think outside of the box.      The position is responsible for Sustained excellence in teaching, research and sponsored R&D Potential for leadership in research, education and institution building.      The incumbent responsible for growth and scale of a very successfully charted program, unique for its vision and strategic design. A Leadership position that goes beyond the traditional approach to education, the role will require one to nurture research, knowledge creation and value creation capabilities through this program and develop, train, and motivate a dynamic team to achieve the objectives of the program and institution.      Candidate from relevant experience in teaching or Industry preferred.

column2: SOME DESIRABLE CHARACTERISTICS ARE            PROFESSORS:    Post-doctoral fellowship with not less than 15 years of experience.        ASSOCIATE PROFESSORS:    Doctorate or Post-Doctoral fellowship with not less than 10 years of experience.      ASSISTANT PROFESSORS: Master s degree with not less than 5 years of experience.      Research paper publications in Scopus https://www.raisoni.net/ed journals. Research could also be on engineering education.      BROAD SCOPE OF WORK      Support the design and delivery of the respective engineering degree program under the autonomous framework      Actively publish research papers in the area of interest      Support the accreditation and affiliation efforts.      Mentor students in the engineering design of products      Lead a flagship initiative of the institution.      DESIRED CANDIDATE PROFILE      Education: UG -B.Tech/ BE - CSE      PG - M.Tech - CSE    Doctorate - Ph.D - CSE
column11: Assistant Associate, Mentor, Engineering Design, Research

column2: Teaching and Instruction: Associate Professors are responsible for teaching undergraduate and/or graduate-level courses in their area of expertise      They develop syllabi, prepare course materials, deliver lectures, facilitate discussions, and assess student performance      They may also supervise student research projects, theses, and dissertations      Research and Scholarship: Associate Professors engage in research activities, pursue scholarly publications, and contribute to the advancement of knowledge in their field      They conduct research projects, secure research funding, collaborate with colleagues, and publish their findings in academic journals or present them at conferences      They may also mentor and guide graduate students in their research pursuits      Academic Advising: Associate Professors provide academic guidance and advising to students      They assist students in selecting courses, developing academic plans, and pursuing research or career opportunities within their discipline      They may also serve as thesis advisors or mentors to graduate students      Service and Committee Work: Associate Professors contribute to the administrative functions of their department, college, or university through service and committee work      They participate in faculty meetings, serve on academic committees, contribute to curriculum development, and provide input on various institutional matters
column11: Administration, Associate Professor, Curriculum development, Mentor, Research, Teaching

column2: Clinical Practice: Providing anesthesia care to patients undergoing various medical procedures, including surgery, obstetrics, and interventional radiology     Teaching and Supervision: Instructing and supervising medical students, residents, and fellows in the field of anesthesiology, including clinical rotations, lectures, and hands-on training     Research: Engaging in clinical research, academic projects, and publications in the field of anesthesiology     Patient Evaluation: Conducting pre-anesthetic assessments and evaluations to determine the best anesthetic plan for each patient     Anesthetic Management: Administering various types of anesthesia, including general, regional, and local anesthesia, and monitoring patients during procedures to ensure their safety and comfort     Intraoperative Monitoring: Continuously monitoring vital signs, fluid balance, and other parameters during surgical procedures     Pain Management: Providing postoperative pain management and relief to ensure patients' comfort during the recovery phase
column11: Administration, Surgical, anaesthesiology, anesthesiology, Associate Professor, Pain management, Radiology, Clinical research, Anesthesia, Monitoring

column2: Job Description: To develop the quality assurance framework within the College?s overall framework, including the validation and revalidation of courses, and student admission and assessment.  To transfer knowledge including practical skills, methods and techniques.  To encourage the development of innovative approaches to course design and delivery and ensure that teaching design and delivery comply with the quality and educational standards and regulations of the department. To set, mark and assess work and examinations and provide feedback to students.  To ensure that the teaching content and methods of delivery are in accordance with equal opportunities, and respond to issues relating to staff and student needs.
column11: Counselor, Mentor, Trainer, Advisor, Educator, Teaching

column2: Associate Professor A Ph.D. Degree with First Class at Bachelor's or Master's Degree in the appropriate branch of Engg. ,  Tech. ,  and eight years experience in teaching / research and /  or in industry at the level of Assistant Professor or equivalent grade ,  excluding the period spent on obtaining the research degree. OR In the event the candidate is from industry and the profession ,  the following shall constitute as essential: (i) First Class Master's Degree in the appropriate branch of Engg. ,  Tech.; (ii) Significant professional work which can be recognized as equivalent to a Ph.D. Degree in appropriate branch of Engg. ,  Tech. ,  and industrial  /  professional experience of eight years in a position equivalent to the level of Assistant Professor ,  Provided that the recognition for significant professional shall be valid only if the same is recommended unanimously by a 3 - Member Committee of Experts appointed by the Vice Chancellor of the University. (B) In addition to the above qualifications ,  the following shall be desirable: (i) Teaching ,  research ,  industrial and  /  or professional experience in a reputed organization; (ii) Published work ,  such as research papers ,  patents filed  /  obtained ,  books ,  and  /  or technical reports; (iii) Experience of guiding the project work  /  dissertation of PG  /  Research Students or supervising R D projects in industry
column11: Associate Professor, Assistant Professor, Research, Research Associate, Supervision, Teaching

column2: University of Petroleum and Energy Studies is looking for Associate Professor to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      Teaching and Instruction: Associate Professors are responsible for teaching undergraduate and/or graduate-level courses in their area of expertise      They develop syllabi, prepare course materials, deliver lectures, facilitate discussions, and assess student performance      They may also supervise student research projects, theses, and dissertations      Research and Scholarship: Associate Professors engage in research activities, pursue scholarly publications, and contribute to the advancement of knowledge in their field      They conduct research projects, secure research funding, collaborate with colleagues, and publish their findings in academic journals or present them at conferences      They may also mentor and guide graduate students in their research pursuits      Academic Advising: Associate Professors provide academic guidance and advising to students      They assist students in selecting courses, developing academic plans, and pursuing research or career opportunities within their discipline      They may also serve as thesis advisors or mentors to graduate students      Service and Committee Work: Associate Professors contribute to the administrative functions of their department, college, or university through service and committee work      They participate in faculty meetings, serve on academic committees, contribute to curriculum development, and provide input on various institutional matters
column11: professor activities, administration, tutoring, academics, teaching, training, mentoring, research, counselling, curriculum development, educational administration, physics, coaching, lecturer activities, school management, student counseling

column2: Professor/Associate Professor/Assistant Professor in Pharmaceutical Chemistry / Pharmacognosy / Pharmaceutical Analysis          Min Experience: As Per Norms of the Council IIMT University invites applications for the positions of Professor, Associate Professor, and Assistant Professor in the fields of Pharmaceutical Chemistry, Pharmacognosy, and Pharmaceutical Analysis       The ideal candidates will contribute to the academic and research excellence of the University, fostering an environment that encourages innovation, critical thinking, and continuous learning         Responsibilities:         Teaching and Curriculum Development: Conduct lectures, seminars, and laboratory sessions     Develop and update curriculum content in alignment with industry trends and academic standards     Research and Publications: Engage in research activities and publish in reputable journals     Collaborate with colleagues and industry partners on research projects     Student Mentorship: Provide academic guidance and mentorship to students     Supervise undergraduate and postgraduate research projects     Contribution to University Committees: Participate actively in departmental and university committees     Contribute to the overall development of the university through participation in academic and administrative activities         Qualifications:         PhD in Pharmaceutical Chemistry / Pharmacognosy / Pharmaceutical Analysis or a related field from a recognized institution     Experience in teaching and/or research at the university level     Demonstrated ability to publish research in reputable journals     Strong communication and interpersonal skills     Knowledge of current trends and advancements in the pharmaceutical industry
column11: Administration, Interpersonal skills, Pharmacognosy, Associate Professor, Curriculum development, Pharma, Research Professor, Development Associate, Assistant Professor

column2: Brief Role :   Job Description   To effectively implement Academic Policies To develop learning outcomes and accordingly achieve teaching goals. To carryout academic/ administrative tasks as and when assigned by Dean within the framework of academic responsibilities To Facilitate the learning process of the students by creating a positive learning environment Preparing lectures,  tutorial,  class exercises,  quizzes,  tests,  etc.,  towards achieving learning outcomes Monitoring,  assessing,  recording,  and disseminating students performance periodically To promptly evaluate and grade students work and provide them appropriate feedback.   Additional Information    Salary:INR 10, 00, 000 -  12, 00, 000 P.A.  Industry:Education /  Teaching /  Training  Functional Area:Teaching ,  Education ,  Training ,  Counselling  Role Category:Other  Role:Other   Desired Candidate Profile   Teaching experience of minimum 10- 15yrs. for Assistant Professor Expertise in subject matter Effective communication skills Good interpersonal skills   Education-    UG: B.B.A /  B.M.S -  Management PG:MBA/ PGDM -  Other Management Doctorate:Ph.

column2: Job Description: To oversee the design and development of the overall curriculum, and develop and deliver a range of programs of study (sometimes for entirely new courses) at various levels.  To develop the quality assurance framework within the College?s overall framework, including the validation and revalidation of courses, and student admission and assessment.  To transfer knowledge including practical skills, methods and techniques.  To encourage the development of innovative approaches to course design and delivery and ensure that teaching design and delivery comply with the quality and educational standards and regulations of the department. To challenge thinking, foster debate and develop the ability of students to engage in critical discourse and rational thinking.  To supervise student projects, field trips and, where appropriate, placements.  To set, mark and assess work and examinations and provide feedback to students.  To ensure that the teaching content and methods of delivery are in accordance with equal opportunities, and respond to issues relating to staff and student needs.
column11: Counselor, Mentor, Trainer, Advisor, Educator, Teaching

column2: We invite applications for faculty positions at the level of        Associate Professor and Assistant Professor        in all academic areas. Specifically, we are looking for candidates in the following areas for immediate recruitment.        Marketing      General Management - Strategy, Entrepreneurship, Social Entrepreneurship      Finance & Accounting      Information Technology Systems & Business Analytics            We are looking for candidates with a PhD or equivalent in the discipline from reputed institutions       Candidates in the final stages of PhD may also apply     Applicants with at least 3-7 years of teaching will be preferred     However, for PhDs from a well known University/Institute (e g ?IIMs/ IITs in India or well-known research universities across the world), and a good research/academic record, the 3 years experience requirement may be waived     Candidates should also have a record of scholarship including published research in reputed peer-reviewed journals (ABDC /SCOPUS indexed)     Our faculty members are expected to involve themselves in collaborative research, course development, institution development, training programmes as well as consultancy work

column2: AMRITA VISHWA VIDYAPEETHAM is looking for Assistant Professor / Associate Professor / Professor in Computer Science to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      Assistant Professor:Entry-level academic position      Responsibilities include teaching undergraduate or graduate courses, conducting research, and contributing to departmental activities      Often involves publishing research papers, mentoring students, and working towards tenure      Engages in curriculum development and may serve on departmental committees      Associate Professor:Mid-career position, typically after tenure      Requires a significant body of research, publications, and demonstrated teaching excellence      Responsibilities include teaching, research, and service to the institution      Often involves mentoring junior faculty, supervising graduate students, and serving on academic committees      Holds a higher level of responsibility and influence within the department      Professor:Highest academic rank within the hierarchy      Requires an exceptional record of research, publication, teaching, and service to the institution      Responsibilities may include leadership roles within the department or university      Often regarded as experts in their field and contribute significantly to the academic community through research, publications, and leadership

column2: We are seeking a highly qualified and experienced Associate professor for the Department of Obstetrical and Gynaecological Nursing. The successful candidate will be responsible for teaching undergraduate and graduate-level courses in Obstetrical and Gynaecological Nursing, conducting research, and providing leadership and guidance to students and colleagues.           Responsibilities:         Teaching: One of the primary responsibilities of an Associate Professor in OBG is to teach medical students, residents, and fellows. This may involve developing curricula, giving lectures, supervising clinical rotations, and providing mentorship and guidance to trainees.     Research: Associate Professors in OBG are often expected to engage in research and scholarship, either independently or as part of a team. This may involve applying for grants, conducting research studies, publishing scholarly articles, and presenting findings at conferences.     Clinical Care: Many Associate Professors in OBG continue to provide clinical care to patients, either in a hospital or outpatient setting. This may involve performing surgeries, providing prenatal care, managing gynecological conditions, and working with patients who have complex medical needs.     Service: Associate Professors in OBG may also be expected to provide service to their institution, profession, and community. This may involve serving on committees, participating in professional organizations, and volunteering in the community.     Leadership: In some cases, Associate Professors in OBG may be asked to provide leadership within their department or institution. This may involve serving as a division chief, program director, or other leadership role.             Qualifications:         A PhD in Nursing or a related field     A minimum of 5 years of experience in teaching and research in Obstetrical and Gynaecological Nursing     A strong record of publications in peer-reviewed journals     A valid nursing registration     Experience in curriculum development and program evaluation         Eligible fields:           Maternal and Child Health,          Womens Health,          Reproductive Health.               Note:               Salary for all positions will be based on qualification and experience and will not be a limiting factor for the right candidate.
column11: Nursing, Publishing, Associate Professor, Curriculum development, Service Associate, Research, Management, Research Associate, Program Director, Teaching

Must have teaching experience:         Demonstrated excellence in teaching at the postgraduate level, commited to innovative pedagogical approaches to student learning, and experience in teaching business analytics, management information systems, data analytics, and related organisational and management subjects. Must show teaching experience in other educational institutions.         Research          Must have demonstrated scholarly research outputs, including publications in peer-reviewed journals and Scopus-indexed conferences, and evidence ongoing research productivity. column2: Job Description: To oversee the design and development of the overall curriculum, and develop and deliver a range of programs of study (sometimes for entirely new courses) at various levels.  To develop the quality assurance framework within the College?s overall framework, including the validation and revalidation of courses, and student admission and assessment.  To transfer knowledge including practical skills, methods and techniques.  To encourage the development of innovative approaches to course design and delivery and ensure that teaching design and delivery comply with the quality and educational standards and regulations of the department. To challenge thinking, foster debate and develop the ability of students to engage in critical discourse and rational thinking.  To supervise student projects, field trips and, where appropriate, placements.  To set, mark and assess work and examinations and provide feedback to students.  To ensure that the teaching content and methods of delivery are in accordance with equal opportunities, and respond to issues relating to staff and student needs. Experience- 4 to 7 years
column11: Counselor, Mentor, Trainer, Advisor, Educator, Teaching

column1: Professor in Computer Engineering/ Information Technology
column2: K J Somaiya Institute of Management Studies and Re... is looking for Professor in Computer Engineering/ Information Technology to join our dynamic team and embark on a rewarding career journey      As a Professor in Computer Engineering or Information Technology, you will serve as a senior faculty member, making significant contributions to the academic and research objectives of the institution      This role involves teaching, conducting cutting-edge research, mentoring students, and participating in the leadership and administration of the department        Key Responsibilities:        Teaching:Conduct advanced undergraduate and graduate courses in computer engineering or information technology      Develop and update curriculum content to reflect the latest advancements and industry trends      Research:Lead and conduct impactful research in the field, contributing to the body of knowledge      Publish research findings in top-tier journals and present at international conferences      Student Mentorship:Mentor graduate students, providing guidance on research projects, theses, and dissertations      Serve as a resource for students seeking academic and career advice      Curriculum Development:Play a key role in the development and enhancement of the computer engineering or information technology curriculum      Integrate emerging technologies and methodologies into course content      Academic Leadership:Participate in departmental leadership and decision-making processes      Collaborate with the department chair and fellow faculty members to shape the academic vision and policies      Committee Participation:Serve on university-level and departmental committees, contributing to institutional governance      Participate in accreditation processes and quality assurance activities      Community Engagement:Engage with the academic and professional communities through conferences, seminars, and collaborative initiatives      Foster partnerships with industry and other academic institutions      Professional Development:Stay abreast of advancements in computer engineering and information technology      Pursue ongoing professional development opportunities and share knowledge with colleagues      Administrative Duties:Take on administrative responsibilities as assigned by academic leadership      Play a role in strategic planning and policy development for the department

column2: SolutionInn is looking for a talented Subject Matter Expert (Civil Engineering). Every great course begins with the knowledge of a Subject Matter Expert (SME). Being an effective SME, however, requires more than an understanding of the subject. Because the SME contributes as one member of a larger development team, skill in navigating the team work environment is essential for success. This challenge is even greater when the SME works with a geographically dispersed team.     Job Responsibilities       Write Answers for advanced questions from different Civil Engineering related textbooks.     Instant answering of Civil Engineering subject questions posted by students.     Apply principle, methods and knowledge of the academic and functional areas to answer questions.       Skills Required       Excellent English communication skills (Reading/ Writing).     Having good hands on knowledge in Civil Engineering and related subjects covered by this degree.     Must have strong analytical skills.     Proficient with using websites.       Required Qualifications       Bachelor or Master s Degree (With Civil Engineering related subjects).     Students with 2nd or 3rd years are welcome to apply.

Work with students who are studying for a degree or a certificate or certification or are taking classes to improve their knowledge or career skills ?? Develop an instructional plan (known as a course outline or syllabus) for the course(s) they teach and ensure that it meets college and department standards ?? Plan lessons and assignments ?? Work with colleagues to develop or modify the curriculum for a degree or certificate program involving a series of courses ?? Assess students??progress by grading papers, tests, and other work ?? Advise students about which classes to take and how to achieve their goals ?? Stay informed about changes and innovations in their field ?? Publish original research and analysis in books and academic journals

column2: Job Description: To oversee the design and development of the overall curriculum, and develop and deliver a range of programs of study (sometimes for entirely new courses) at various levels.  To develop the quality assurance framework within the College?s overall framework, including the validation and revalidation of courses, and student admission and assessment.  To transfer knowledge including practical skills, methods and techniques.  To encourage the development of innovative approaches to course design and delivery and ensure that teaching design and delivery comply with the quality and educational standards and regulations of the department. To challenge thinking, foster debate and develop the ability of students to engage in critical discourse and rational thinking.  To supervise student projects, field trips and, where appropriate, placements.  To set, mark and assess work and examinations and provide feedback to students.  To ensure that the teaching content and methods of delivery are in accordance with equal opportunities, and respond to issues relating to staff and student needs.

column2: Curriculum Development: Develop and update the curriculum for civil engineering courses, ensuring that it aligns with industry standards and technological advancements     Lectures and Class Instruction: Deliver lectures, conduct classes, and engage students in discussions and interactive learning activities to impart knowledge in subjects like structural engineering, geotechnical engineering, transportation engineering, and more     Laboratory Supervision: Oversee laboratory sessions, experiments, and practical demonstrations to provide hands-on experience and reinforce theoretical concepts     Research: Engage in research activities related to civil engineering, publish research papers, and contribute to the field's knowledge base     Student Guidance: Provide guidance and mentorship to students, including advising on academic and career-related matters, supervising research projects, and assisting with internship and job placements     Assessment and Evaluation: Design and administer assessments, tests, and examinations to evaluate students' understanding and knowledge in the subject matter     Grading and Feedback: Evaluate student assignments, projects, and exams, and provide constructive feedback for improvement     Collaboration: Collaborate with other faculty members and departments on interdisciplinary projects, research, and course development     Industry Engagement: Establish connections with the industry to bring real-world applications and case studies into the classroom, fostering a practical understanding of civil engineering concepts
column11: Civil, Teaching

column2: Looking for Professors with Doctorate (PhD) in Computer Science (CS) / Information Science (IS) / Information Technology (IT) / Artificial Intelligence (AI) / Machine Learning (ML) / Data Science (DS) for below mentioned Departments. Dept of Computer Science (CS) Engineering Dept of Information Science (IS) Engineering Dept of Computer Science - AI and ML Engineering Dept of Computer Science - Data Science Engineering Desired Candidate Profile Doctorate (PhD) in Computer Science - Allied Specialization [Computer Science (CS) / Information Science (IS) / Information Technology (IT) / Artificial Intelligence (AI) / Machine Learning (ML) / Data Science (DS) etc]. 10 Years Teaching Experience in Engineering College after Masters in Computer Science - Allied Specialization and 5 Years Experience working as Associate Professor. Masters (M. E. / M. Tech. / M. S. or Integrated M. Tech) in Computer Science (CS) / Information Science (IS) / Information Technology (IT) / Artificial Intelligence (AI) / Machine Learning (ML) / Data Science (DS). Note: All HoD, Professors, Associate Professors, Assistant Professors, Teaching Assistants are recruited on the payroll of the Institution. Recruitment is done directly and also through Consultants. Only applicants who are interested to work from Institution Campus (Offline) need to apply. Teaching Demo and Technical Interview will be held Online or Offline in Bengaluru Campus. Shortlisted Applicants need to join us immediately (or max within 60 days). Applicants looking for only Online / Work from Home Opportunities permanently will not be considered for this role. This is a scheduled Interview drive (Online and Offline Interview). This requirement is for Bengaluru Location. We dont offer or confirm selection to any candidate without Direct (Face to Face) Offline Interview (atleast 1 round of discussion) in Bengaluru. All recruitments will be on the payroll of the Institution. Candidates need not pay any Fee / Charges to any Consultant for Registration / Placement fee.

Dept of Computer Science (CS) Engineering Dept of Information Science (IS) Engineering Dept of Computer Science - AI and ML Engineering Dept of Computer Science - Data Science Engineering Desired Candidate Profile Doctorate (PhD) in Computer Science - Allied Specialization [Computer Science (CS) / Information Science (IS) / Information Technology (IT) / Artificial Intelligence (AI) / Machine Learning (ML) / Data Science (DS) etc]. 15 Years Teaching Experience in Engineering College after Masters in Computer Science - Allied Specialization and 3 Years Experience working as Professor. Masters (M. E. / M. Tech. / M. S. or Integrated M. Tech) in Computer Science (CS) / Information Science (IS) / Information Technology (IT) / Artificial Intelligence (AI) / Machine Learning (ML) / Data Science (DS). Note: All HoD, Professors, Associate Professors, Assistant Professors, Teaching Assistants are recruited on the payroll of the Institution. Recruitment is done directly and also through Consultants. Only applicants who are interested to work from Institution Campus (Offline) need to apply. Teaching Demo and Technical Interview will be held Online or Offline in Bengaluru Campus. Shortlisted Applicants need to join us immediately (or max within 60 days). Applicants looking for only Online / Work from Home Opportunities permanently will not be considered for this role. This is a scheduled Interview drive (Online and Offline Interview). This requirement is for Bengaluru Location. We dont offer or confirm selection to any candidate without Direct (Face to Face) Offline Interview (atleast 1 round of discussion) in Bengaluru. All recruitments will be on the payroll of the Institution. Candidates need not pay any Fee / Charges to any Consultant for Registration / Placement fee.

column2: Graduates / Post Graduates in Computer education streams, All Engineering streams.      Candidates with good communication skills shall be Preferred.      Description:     To meet its growing demand of Developers, Implementation Consultants, Trust Systems Software provides professional training to the selected candidates in skills like ASP.Net, PHP, SQL Programming, Core Banking Solution Consultant, ERP Implementation Consultant.     The training is provided with real-life cases by experienced and expert professionals in respective skills.      Post training the best performing candidates shall join us and become the part of our team.

column2: Job Description: Perform independently /assist in procedures as per the clinical privileges authorized. Treat & manage the / in patients. Maintain a patient log book/ records. Monitor daily outdating. To review all use as needed and discuss problems with consultant.  To complete patient history form, visit patient and review medical record. Obtain relevant clinical information for inclusion in report. Assists the Consultant for: Special material management requirement Ensure quality of performance of the department  To co-ordinate the Inter and Intra-departmental activities in research, camps, presentations, referral reply to doctors etc To be an in-house consultant for all emergency situations encountered in the hospital. Interaction with patient attendants to brief them about current status, anticipated recovery and any other specific issues or problems Supervise all nursing/ paramedical & non-medical staff of the department to maintain discipline and high standard of medical care at the department as per standard operating procedure

column2: Job Description - 1. Responsible for writing a detailed patient history 2. Responsible for physical examination of admitted patients as directed by the physician/clinician 3. Assess all patients and present each patient case during the rounds in a clear manner, showing understanding of the cause of illness, diagnosis, care plan, and treatment outcomes 4. Write an appropriate admission note which includes plan of care and education plan for every patient admitted 5. Initiate discharge planning 6. Oversee total care of the allotted patients, including daily examinations, patient education, writing daily notes, and requesting consultations 7. Ensure that the senior resident is aware of any changes in the status of the patients, including any abnormal findings 8. Ensure that the pre-operative communication and documentation with the patient and his relatives is completed in time 9. Perform minor procedures for which he/she is privileged according to the level of training 10. Supervise the daily clinical management of patients in conjunction with the nurse in charge and under the guidance of the treating physician/clinician 11. Attend all post operative patients on the day of operation and every day following 12. To undertake emergency procedures, including resuscitation as required, and to take the lead as necessary 13. To comply with all hospital policies and procedures, in particular to those relating to health and safety at work.
column11: consultant, critical care, Resident, medicine, ICU, hospital

column1: Hiring For ELP Faculty ( Part Time ) -Noida , Hyderabad, Pune , Jaipur
column2: Role & responsibilities   URGENT HIRING FOR   ELP ,ENGLISH LANGUAGE PROGRAM) FACULTY  PART TIME    Location-   Noida , Pune, Hyderabad, Bangalore, Jaipur, Kolkata   PART TIME  APPROX 12-15 HRS PER WEEK SUBJECT TO BUSINESS DYNAMICS AND REQUIREMENTS. THESE HOURS SHOULD NOT BE TREATED AS MANDATORY.   We are seeking experienced English language tutors to join our team and deliver high-quality training for IELTS, TOEFL, and PTE exams. The ideal candidate will have a minimum of 2 years of teaching experience, with additional certifications in ESL or exam preparation being an added benefit. The role involves training students for English language proficiency tests, providing constructive feedback on their performance, collecting actual test scores, and achieving excellent results.   Conducting training sessions :   Develop and deliver comprehensive training sessions for IELTS, TOEFL, and PTE exams.  Create engaging lesson plans that cover all sections of the exams (Listening, Reading, Writing, Speaking).  Employ a variety of teaching methods to accommodate different learning styles and abilities.  Providing feedback :   Evaluate students' progress through regular assessments and mock tests.  Provide constructive feedback on students' strengths and areas for improvement.  Offer strategies and techniques to help students improve their performance in each exam section.  Monitoring progress :   Track and monitor students' progress throughout the training program.  Identify students who may need additional support and create tailored learning plans for them.  Maintain accurate records of students' performance and achievements.  Facilitating practice assessments :   Arrange and facilitate practice tests for? IELTS, TOEFL, and PTE tests for students.  Collect and record students' actual test scores and results.  Analyze test scores to assess the effectiveness of the training program and make necessary adjustments.  Achieving performance goals :   Strive to achieve high success rates for students in their IELTS, TOEFL, and PTE exams.  Work collaboratively with students to set realistic goals and timelines for exam preparation.  Utilize innovative teaching methods and resources to maximize students' potential and performance.
